label: Viola
description: Instruction in viola at the undergraduate level. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Passing of a performance audition is required prior to the initial registration in any applied music course. Music majors must register concurrently in MUS 250.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 16 hours. Prerequisite: Passing of a performance audition is required prior to the initial registration in any applied music course. Music majors must register concurrently in MUS 250.
classScheduleInformation: Only open to students who have passed a qualifying audition. Non-music majors will be assessed a fee.
